description: Display metrics gathered from a fresh tomato router

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "load.uptime" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(value) FROM "network.$wan.receive.bytes"  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(value) FROM "network.$lan.receive.bytes" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "hour.receive.bytes" WHERE router =~ /^$router$/ AND device =~ /^$wan$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "temp.cpu.degrees" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "temp.eth1.degrees" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "temp.eth2.degrees" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(value) FROM "network.eth1.receive.bytes" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(value) FROM "network.eth2.receive.bytes" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "speedtest.download" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "client.count" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
select "value" FROM "mem.used.kilobytes" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
select "value" FROM "mem.total.kilobytes" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(value) FROM "network.$wan.transmit.bytes" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter

SELECT 
    non_negative_derivative(value) 
FROM 
    "network.$lan.transmit.bytes" 
WHERE 
    router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND 
    $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "day.receive.bytes" WHERE router =~ /^$router$/ AND device =~ /^$wan$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(value) FROM "network.eth1.transmit.bytes" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT non_negative_derivative(value) FROM "network.eth2.transmit.bytes" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "speedtest.upload" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "ping.google.latency" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("value")  FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.$wan.receive.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value")  FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.$wan.transmit.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value")  FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.$lan.receive.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value")  FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.$lan.transmit.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(value) 
FROM "hour.receive.bytes" 
WHERE router=~ /^$router$/ and device =~ /^$wan$/ 
AND $timeFilter 
group by time(10m)

SELECT mean(value) 
FROM "hour.transmit.bytes" 
WHERE router=~ /^$router$/ and device =~ /^$wan$/ 
AND $timeFilter  
group by time(10m)

SELECT mean(value)
 FROM "day.receive.bytes" 
WHERE router=~ /^$router$/ and device =~ /^$wan$/ AND $timeFilter
group by time(2h)

SELECT mean(value)
 FROM "day.transmit.bytes" 
WHERE router=~ /^$router$/ and device =~ /^$wan$/ AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(2h)

SELECT mean(value) 
FROM "week.receive.bytes" 
WHERE router=~ /^$router$/ 
and device =~ /^$wan$/ 
AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(12h)

SELECT mean(value)
FROM "week.transmit.bytes" 
WHERE router=~ /^$router$/ and device =~ /^$wan$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(12h)

SELECT mean(value)
FROM "month.receive.bytes" 
WHERE router=~ /^$router$/ 
AND device =~ /^$wan$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(2d)

SELECT mean(value) 
FROM "month.transmit.bytes" 
WHERE router=~ /^$router$/ and device =~ /^$wan$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(2d)

SELECT mean("value")  FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.eth2.receive.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value")  FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.eth2.transmit.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value")  FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.eth1.receive.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value")  FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.eth1.transmit.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "cpu.iowait" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "cpu.user" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "cpu.system" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "cpu.softirq" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "cpu.nice" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "cpu.irq" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "cpu.idle" 
  WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "load.load_one.number" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "load.load_five.number" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "load.load_fifteen.number" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "temp.cpu.degrees" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "temp.eth1.degrees" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "temp.eth2.degrees" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT value FROM "disk./opt.used" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "disk./opt.percent" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "mem.used.kilobytes" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "mem.buffers.kilobytes" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "mem.cached.kilobytes" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "mem.active.kilobytes" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "mem.inactive.kilobytes" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "mem.free.kilobytes" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "mem.total.kilobytes" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "ping.google.packetloss.percent" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT "value" FROM "speedtest.download" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT "value" FROM "speedtest.upload" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("value") FROM "connections.icmp.number" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "connections.tcp.number" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "connections.udp.number" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "connections.total" WHERE router =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ping.google.latency" WHERE router::tag =~ /(^$router$|\s*)/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)

list.definition: show tag values with key = router
list.label: Router
list.name: router
list.query: show tag values with key = router

title: Fresh Tomato Router
